name: Select Ability
description: Select an ability to see its description.

name: Action Star
lvl1: No energy penalty when repeating an action.
lvl2: Gain a third action by spending 2 energy.
lvl3: Third action no longer costs 2 energy.

name: Adept
description: Your character can temporarily increase proficiency by spending resources.
lvl1: Adept: Prior to attempting an action, you can spend 1 resource (of the same type as the proficiency) to increase the proficiency by 1. The roll cost is still the same.
lvl2: There is now no limit to the amount of times you can use Adept for a given action.
lvl3: Adept now costs 1 resource to increase proficiency by 2.

name: Analyst
description: Gain the Analyze ability - Learn the exact number you must beat for any action that requires a roll or the exact health of a target.
lvl1: Can use Analyze 3 times a play session.
lvl2: Analyze can be used 5 times a play session. Determining the health of enemy targets no longer count towards this limit.
lvl3: Analyze can be used without counting to the play session limit as long as your character is the one attempting the roll.

name: Brawler
description: Hit multiple enemies with your melee attacks.
lvl1: Cleave : when hitting an enemy with a melee attack, deal half damage to another enemy adjacent to your target that is within your range.
lvl2: Hit an additional enemy with your cleave.
lvl3: Deal full damage with your cleave attacks.

name: Cheerleader
description: Your character can spend resources to improve the rolls of other characters.
lvl1: Go Team!: Prior to another player making an active roll, you can spend 1 resource (matching the resource they use) to improve their roll by 1d6
lvl2: If You Can't Do It!: You can now spend as much energy/sanity as you like to improve a roll.
lvl3: Nobody Can!: You can now improve a player's roll retroactively after the player makes the roll.

name: Encyclopedia
description: Your character gains Knowledge ability. You can attempt any skill even for a skill you don't possess as long as you pass a passive intelligence check first.
lvl1: Can use Knowledge twice a play session.
lvl2: Knowledge no longer has a play session limit.
lvl3: No longer need to pass an intelligence check to use Knowledge.

name: Hunter
description: Your character gains bonuses from stealth attacks.
lvl1: Gain an additional free attack roll when attacking unnoticed from stealth.
lvl2: Gain an additional 1d6 damage roll when attacking unnoticed from stealth.
lvl3: When attacking from stealth, each damage and attack roll gains a +2 bonus.

name: Lucky
description: Gain the Mulligan ability - Re-roll any roll. Limited uses per play session.
lvl1: Can use Mulligan once a play session.
lvl2: Can use Mulligan twice a play session.
lvl3: Can use Mulligan three times a play session

name: Martial Artist
description: Your character gains reaction attacks to enemy melee attacks.
lvl1: Fast as Lightening: Successful dodging or grab-breaking gives you a melee attack reaction, but you can only roll 1 dice for this attack.
lvl2: A Little Bit Frightening: Successful dodging or grab-breaking gives you a full melee attack reaction, where you can roll as many dice as you like.
lvl3: Kungfu Fighting: Making a melee attack automatically prepares you for dodging.

name: Mutation
lvl1: Your character can no longer utilize any skills, most abilities, and most proficiencies. Any ranged attack roll made with a gun or projectile weapon is halved. Your character's Intelligence and Charisma is limited to 0, and Sanity max is limited to 25. Strength, Perception, and Dexterity can now be increased up to 8. You may add your strength modifier to any melee damage. You cannot level up this ability through regular means.

name: Sniper
description: Allows you to add a bonus roll to ranged attacks without spending any resource.
lvl1: Snipe: Spend 1 action on your turn to add 1 free roll to any ranged attack without having to spend any resource.
lvl3: As long as you don't move on your turn, you no longer need to spend an action to use Snipe.

name: Therapist
description: Gain the Counseling ability - Restore 1d4 + chamod sanity. Any character can only receive counseling at most once a day
lvl1: Can use Counseling twice a day.
lvl2: Counseling now restores 1d6 + chamod. Gain 1 additional use.
lvl3: Counseling now restores to 1d8 + chamod. Gain 1 additional use.
